title: Ticket #3377: gridmanager reports poor hold message for blahp failure
description:
When the blahp fails, we get a relatively poor error message back to the user. For example, for this message in the log: 

12/13/12 11:30:22 [20055] (110.0) doEvaluateState called: gmState GM_SAVE_SANDBOX_ID, remoteState 0
12/13/12 11:30:25 [20055] (110.0) doEvaluateState called: gmState GM_SUBMIT, remoteState 0
12/13/12 11:30:25 [20055] (110.0) blah_job_submit() failed: Unable to limit the proxy
12/13/12 11:30:28 [20055] (110.0) doEvaluateState called: gmState GM_CLEAR_REQUEST, remoteState 0
12/13/12 11:30:33 [20055] (110.0) doEvaluateState called: gmState GM_SAVE_SANDBOX_ID, remoteState 0

I get the following hold reason: 

 110.0   uscmsPool018   12/13 11:30 Attempts to submit failed

Next step will be to figure out what "Unable to limit the proxy" really means! That probably can be a more precise error message also.
check_ins:
2017-Feb-28 11:12   Check-in [50222]: Docs for hold reason improvement on grid batch submit failure. #3377 (By Jaime Frey )
2017-Feb-13 16:43   Check-in [50150]: Improve hold reason when grid batch jobs fail on submission. #3377 (By Jaime Frey )
creator: bbockelm
